entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Friday 21 April 2023
